metadata.title: CVE-2023-52815 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/vkms: fix a possible null pointer dereference Inamdgpu_vkms_conn_get_modes(), the return value of drm_cvt_mode() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereference on failureof drm_cvt_mode(). Add a check to avoid null pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
